channel.title: Preferences on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Preferences on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Shipping - Preferences - Handling
item.description: BO - Shipping - Preferences - Handling Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-976 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shipping > Preferences Preferences pages is displayed In Handling block, see the following : Handling charges : 2€ (tax excl.) Free shipping starts at 0€

item.title: BO - Shipping - Preferences - Sort by Order By
item.description: BO - Shipping - Preferences - Sort by Order By Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-977 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/09_shipping/02_preferences/02_carrierOptions/02_updateCarriersSortOptiontests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/09_shipping/02_preferences/02_carrierOptions/02_updateCarriersSortOption.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO>Shipping > Preferences the Preferences page is displayed Go to Carrier options> change the sort by and order by > click save An alert “Update successful.

item.title: BO - Shipping - Preferences - Default carrier
item.description: BO - Shipping - Preferences - Default carrier Details Component : Core Status : Automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x, 9.0.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-978 Test : https://github.com/PrestaShop/PrestaShop/tree/develop/tests/UI/campaigns/functional/BO/09_shipping/02_preferences/02_carrierOptions/01_defaultCarrier.ts Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO>Shipping > Preferences the Preferences page is displayed Go to Carrier options> change the Default carrier> click save An alert “Update successful.” is displayed.
